=Django Simple Captcha=

== Generators ==
The following generators are available:

=== Random chars ===
http://django-simple-captcha.googlecode.com/files/Random%20chars.png

`CAPTCHA_CHALLENGE_FUNCT = 'captcha.helpers.random_char_challenge'`



=== Simple Math ===
http://django-simple-captcha.googlecode.com/files/Math.png

`CAPTCHA_CHALLENGE_FUNCT = 'captcha.helpers.math_challenge'`

=== Dictionary Word ===
http://django-simple-captcha.googlecode.com/files/Dictionary.png

`CAPTCHA_CHALLENGE_FUNCT = 'captcha.helpers.word_challenge'`
